content.description: Left most route.  Shares first two bolts with Intro Ramp.  Chains are to the left; Intro Ramp's chains are to the right.
content.location: Park on Memphis St and walk up Red Rock drive.  You'll either have to brave the ravine or cross a private driveway to get into the canyon.  About 15 minute hike up the canyon and you'll see the unmistakable cliff on the south (left hand) side.  This route is the first set of bolts and chains.

content.description: Use liebacks and sidepulls up a vertical crack that turns horizontal to the right.  Mantle up the ledge to the chains.
content.location: Park on Memphis St and walk up Red Rock drive.  You'll either have to brave the ravine or cross a private driveway to get into the canyon.  About 15 minute hike up the canyon and you'll see the unmistakable cliff on the south (left hand) side.  This route is top roped after leading the second set of bolts and chains.

content.description:
Best route on the wall curently.  This is the bolted route to the far right on the other side of the major crack/roof.  It's the only set of bolts and chains currently on the right side, although there's certainly plenty of rock to add more routes. 

  Starts on a crimpy bare section leading to the crux roof.  Plenty of bolts provide adequate protection.  Staying left after the roof is easier but more chossy.  Staying right after the roof is more challenging and probably ups the grade.
content.location: Park on Memphis St and walk up Red Rock drive.  You'll either have to brave the ravine or cross a private driveway to get into the canyon.  About 15 minute hike up the canyon and you'll see the unmistakable cliff on the south (left hand) side.  This route is the last set of bolts and chains on the far right.

content.description: This route shares the first two bolts with Yellow Line then cuts right to the second set of chains.
content.location: Park on Memphis St and walk up Red Rock drive.  You'll either have to brave the ravine or cross a private driveway to get into the canyon.  About 15 minute hike up the canyon and you'll see the unmistakable cliff on the south (left hand) side.  This route is the second set of bolts and chains.
